blocks.content: 1.3 Why Version Control, Hosting, and Security Are Needed

Web development is not just about writing code ‚Äî it also requires team collaboration (version control), deployment (hosting), and protection (security). Using an online bookstore as an example, these three elements are indispensable.
Imagine you and three friends are developing an online bookstore website together:

items: Friend A edits the book list
Friend B edits the shopping cart

blocks.content:
Without version control = you might overwrite each other‚Äôs code, causing chaos.
With version control (Git) = every change is recorded, and you can roll back to a previous version if something breaks.

items: **Basic Steps**: `git init ‚Üí git add ‚Üí git commit`
**Benefits**: Supports team collaboration, quick error tracking, prevents code loss

blocks.title: Analogy
blocks.content: Version control is like a time machine ‚Äî you can always return to a stable version of the site. (See Section 2.1 for details.)
After finishing your site, you need to deploy it to the Internet so others can access it.

For example:
- Without hosting: You can only open the site on your own computer.
- With hosting: Deploy to Netlify or AWS, and anyone can open your online bookstore via a URL.

items: **Benefits**: Global accessibility, automated deployment, reliable uptime

blocks.title: Analogy
blocks.content: Hosting is like renting a storefront ‚Äî without it, customers can‚Äôt walk in.
Without security, your online bookstore could be hacked at any time, leaking customer data or crashing the site.

items: - SQL Injection (steal user data through database exploits)
- CSRF (forged requests, tricking users into unintended actions)
- DDoS (traffic overload, causing the site to crash)
- Manage permissions (avoid giving admin rights to regular users)
- Add firewall or CDN (e.g., Cloudflare to defend against DDoS)

blocks.title: Analogy
blocks.content: Security is like a security system ‚Äî without it, your store could be broken into anytime.

rows: Code chaos, hard to fix errors
Site only runs on your computer
Prone to hacks, data leaks, site downtime

blocks.title: Summary
blocks.content: To build a complete, professional website: **Version Control** keeps development organized, **Hosting** puts the site online, and **Security** ensures stability and trust. All three are essential.
